item.description:
Do you know a guy who likes to sing? If so, please forward this invitation!

Rehearse with the Sounds of Concord chorus on Thursday evenings 11/5, 11/12, 11/19, 12/3 at 7:30 PM at Temple Emunah, 9 Piper Road, in Lexington.

You'll get sheet music and learning CDs for no cost!

Practice songs including "Winter Wonderland", "Hark the Herald Angels Sing", "Silent Night" and even "Jingle Bell Rock".

then join us for singing in the Concord and Lexington area at town center events, and for appreciative audiences at several local hospitals!

For more information: Call Jonathan Watson, 617-484-3005, or go to www.SoundsOfConcord.org
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the room at the top of the main stairs as you come in the entrance.

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: Christmas Caroling-Barbershop style!
